Results.Title: Kursadzije
Results.Plot: A sitcom situated in a classroom, where the students come from each republic of the former Yugoslavia and make fun of each other.
Results.Stars: Aleksandar Kukic, Milos Milakovic, Kosta Stefanovic, Ljiljana Jaksic

Results.Title: Attack on Titan
Results.Plot: Fueled by the death of his mother at the hands of the titans, Eren Jaeger vows revenge against the species that have breached through the enclosing walls after 100 years of peace, threatening the remains of humanity.
Results.Stars: Yûki Kaji, Marina Inoue, Josh Grelle, Yui Ishikawa

Results.Title: The Twilight Zone
Results.Plot: Ordinary people find themselves in extraordinarily astounding situations, which they each try to solve in a remarkable manner.
Results.Stars: Rod Serling, Robert McCord, Jay Overholts, Vaughn Taylor

Results.Title: Gravity Falls
Results.Plot: Twin siblings Dipper and Mabel Pines spend the summer at their great-uncle's tourist trap in the enigmatic Gravity Falls, Oregon.
Results.Stars: Jason Ritter, Alex Hirsch, Kristen Schaal, Linda Cardellini

Results.Title: Stranger Things
Results.Plot: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.
Results.Stars: Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Winona Ryder, David Harbour

Results.Title: Berserk
Results.Plot: Guts is a skilled swordsman who joins forces with a mercenary group named 'The Band of the Hawk', lead by the charismatic Griffith, and fights with them as they battle their way into the royal court.
Results.Stars: Marc Diraison, Nobutoshi Canna, Carrie Keranen, Kevin T. Collins

Results.Title: What We Do in the Shadows
Results.Plot: A look into the daily (or rather, nightly) lives of three vampires, who've lived together for over 100 years, on Staten Island.
Results.Stars: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou, Harvey Guillén

Results.Title: Mob Psycho 100
Results.Plot: A psychic middle school boy tries to live a normal life and keep his growing powers under control, even though he constantly gets into trouble.
Results.Stars: Setsuo Ito, Takahiro Sakurai, Akio Ôtsuka, Kyle McCarley

Results.Title: Hannibal
Results.Plot: Explores the early relationship between renowned psychiatrist Hannibal Lecter and a young FBI criminal profiler who is haunted by his ability to empathize with serial killers.
Results.Stars: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas, Laurence Fishburne

Results.Title: Paranormal
Results.Plot: Set in the 1960s, the series, packed with mystery and suspense, depicts the adventures of Doctor Refaat Ismail, a single hematologist who finds himself faced with a series of supernatural events.
Results.Stars: Karla Maatouk, Razane Jammal, Nick Shakoour, Ahmed Amin

Results.Title: Supernatural
Results.Plot: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons and gods that roam the earth.
Results.Stars: Jared Padalecki, Jensen Ackles, Jim Beaver, Misha Collins

Results.Title: Love, Death & Robots
Results.Plot: A collection of animated short stories that span various genres including science fiction, fantasy, horror and comedy.
Results.Stars: Scott Whyte, Nolan North, Steven Pacey, Emily O'Brien

Results.Title: Twin Peaks
Results.Plot: Picks up 25 years after the inhabitants of a quaint northwestern town are stunned when their homecoming queen is murdered.
Results.Stars: Kyle MacLachlan, Sheryl Lee, Michael Horse, Chrysta Bell

Results.Title: Inside No. 9
Results.Plot: Anthology series which mixes dark humor with genres like crime, horror or drama. The show invites viewers into some very different No.9s, where the ordinary and mundane rub shoulders with the extraordinary and macabre.
Results.Stars: Reece Shearsmith, Steve Pemberton, Derek Jacobi, Katherine Parkinson

Results.Title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
Results.Plot: The story of the Joestar family, who are possessed with intense psychic strength, and the adventures each member encounters throughout their lives.
Results.Stars: Matthew Mercer, David Vincent, Daisuke Ono, Unshô Ishizuka

Results.Title: Mushi-Shi
Results.Plot: Ginko is an expert travelling around to investigate a primeval life-form, the "Mushi," and helping people with Mushi-related supernatural problems.
Results.Stars: Yûto Nakano, Travis Willingham, Kôjun Itô, Jennifer Seman

Results.Title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
Results.Plot: Series of unrelated short stories covering elements of crime, horror, drama, and comedy about people of different backgrounds committing murders, suicides, thefts, and other sorts of crime caused by certain motivations, perceived or not.
Results.Stars: Alfred Hitchcock, Harry Tyler, John Williams, Patricia Hitchcock

Results.Title: Dororo
Results.Plot: A father in pursuit of power gives parts of his new-born son to a host of demons. Years later, the son battles those demons to regain what is rightfully his.
Results.Stars: Jason Douglas, Rio Suzuki, Mugihito, Chaney Moore

Results.Title: The Promised Neverland
Results.Plot: When three gifted kids at an isolated idyllic orphanage discover the secret and sinister purpose they were raised for, they look for a way to escape from their evil caretaker and lead the other children in a risky escape plan.
Results.Stars: Sumire Morohoshi, Mariya Ise, Shinei Ueki, Lynn

Results.Title: Kingdom
Results.Plot: While strange rumors about their ill King grip a kingdom, the crown prince becomes their only hope against a mysterious plague overtaking the land.
Results.Stars: Ju Ji-Hoon, Bae Doona, Kim Sungkyu, Kim Hye-jun

Results.Title: Ash vs Evil Dead
Results.Plot: Ash has spent the last thirty years avoiding responsibility, maturity, and the terrors of the Evil Dead until a Deadite plague threatens to destroy all of mankind and Ash becomes mankind's only hope.
Results.Stars: Bruce Campbell, Ray Santiago, Dana DeLorenzo, Lucy Lawless

Results.Title: Parasyte: The Maxim
Results.Plot: 17-year-old Shinichi Izumi is partially infected by a Parasyte, monsters that butcher and consume humans. He must learn to co-exist with the creature if he is to survive both the life of a Parasyte and a human as part monster, part person.
Results.Stars: Brittney Karbowski, Nobunaga Shimazaki, Adam Gibbs, Aya Hirano

Results.Title: The Originals
Results.Plot: A family of power-hungry thousand-year-old vampires look to take back the city that they built and dominate all those who have done them wrong.
Results.Stars: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Claire Holt, Phoebe Tonkin

Results.Title: Invader ZIM
Results.Plot: An alien named Zim from the planet Irk is sent on a secret mission to conquer Earth, not realising that his leaders were just trying to get rid of him and hoped that he would die. Once there, Zim manages to disguise himself as a human child, but one boy named Dib sees through his disguise.
Results.Stars: Andy Berman, Richard Steven Horvitz, Rikki Simons, Melissa Fahn

Results.Title: The League of Gentlemen
Results.Plot: An interweaving narrative chronicling the antics of such diverse characters as: a transgender taxi driver, a family obsessed with hygiene and toads, a fiery reverend, a carnival owner who kidnaps women into marriage, and a xenophobic couple who run a local shop for local people.
Results.Stars: Mark Gatiss, Steve Pemberton, Reece Shearsmith, Jeremy Dyson

Results.Title: Castlevania
Results.Plot: A vampire hunter fights to save a besieged city from an army of otherworldly creatures controlled by Dracula.
Results.Stars: Richard Armitage, James Callis, Alejandra Reynoso, Theo James

Results.Title: The Walking Dead
Results.Plot: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.
Results.Stars: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Melissa McBride, Lauren Cohan

Results.Title: Courage the Cowardly Dog
Results.Plot: The offbeat adventures of Courage, a cowardly dog who must overcome his own fears to heroically defend his unknowing farmer owners from all kinds of dangers, paranormal events and menaces that appear around their land.
Results.Stars: Marty Grabstein, Thea White, Peter Fernandez, Simon Prebble

Results.Title: The Kingdom
Results.Plot: Doctors at an ultramodern hospital in Denmark become convinced, by way of weird, inexplicable happenings, that the place is haunted.
Results.Stars: Ernst-Hugo Järegård, Kirsten Rolffes, Ghita Nørby, Søren Pilmark

Results.Title: Penny Dreadful
Results.Plot: Explorer Sir Malcolm Murray, American gunslinger Ethan Chandler, scientist Victor Frankenstein and medium Vanessa Ives unite to combat supernatural threats in Victorian London.
Results.Stars: Josh Hartnett, Timothy Dalton, Eva Green, Reeve Carney

Results.Title: Bates Motel
Results.Plot: A contemporary prequel to Psycho, giving a portrayal of how Norman Bates' psyche unravels through his teenage years, and how deeply intricate his relationship with his mother, Norma, truly is.
Results.Stars: Vera Farmiga, Freddie Highmore, Max Thieriot, Nicola Peltz

Results.Title: Are You Afraid of the Dark?
Results.Plot: A group of teenagers get together in the woods, and tell ghost stories.
Results.Stars: Ross Hull, Daniel DeSanto, Raine Pare-Coull, Jodie Resther

Results.Title: BrainDead
Results.Plot: A government employee discovers that the cause of the tensions between the two political parties is a race of extraterrestrial insects eating the brains of the politicians.
Results.Stars: Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Danny Pino, Aaron Tveit, Tony Shalhoub

Results.Title: The Returned
Results.Plot: In a small French mountain town where everyone knows each other, the dead begin to inexplicably return as if their death never happened. Forcing the townsfolk to confront their difficult past as they seek to understand this phenomenon.
Results.Stars: Anne Consigny, Clotilde Hesme, Frédéric Pierrot, Céline Sallette

Results.Title: American Horror Story
Results.Plot: An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, a slasher summer camp, and a bleak beach town and desert valley.
Results.Stars: Lady Gaga, Kathy Bates, Angela Bassett, Sarah Paulson

Results.Title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
Results.Plot: Scooby-Doo and the gang attempt to solve creepy mysteries in the town of Crystal Cove, a place with a history of eerie supernatural events.
Results.Stars: Frank Welker, Mindy Cohn, Grey Griffin, Matthew Lillard

Results.Title: The Exorcist
Results.Plot: Follows three priests dealing with cases of a demonic presence targeting a family and a foster home.
Results.Stars: Alfonso Herrera, Ben Daniels, Kurt Egyiawan, Hannah Kasulka

Results.Title: Preacher
Results.Plot: After a supernatural event at his church, a preacher enlists the help of a vampire and his ex to find God.
Results.Stars: Dominic Cooper, Joe Gilgun, Ruth Negga, Ian Colletti

Results.Title: In the Flesh
Results.Plot: Four years after the Rising, the government starts to rehabilitate the Undead for reentry into society, including teenager Kieren Walker, who returns to his small Lancashire village to face a hostile reception, as well as his own demons.
Results.Stars: Luke Newberry, Harriet Cains, Marie Critchley, Steve Cooper

Results.Title: Grimm
Results.Plot: A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.
Results.Stars: David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz

Results.Title: Ugly Americans
Results.Plot: Take New York City, add every horrifying beast, science-fiction freak, and fantasy faerie, shake thoroughly, and you've got Ugly Americans.
Results.Stars: Matt Oberg, Natasha Leggero, Kurt Metzger, Randy Pearlstein

Results.Title: Yellowjackets
Results.Plot: A wildly talented high school girl soccer team becomes the (un)lucky survivors of a plane crash deep in the Canadian wilderness.
Results.Stars: Melanie Lynskey, Tawny Cypress, Ella Purnell, Sophie Nélisse

Results.Title: Millennium
Results.Plot: A former FBI profiler with the ability to look inside the mind of a killer begins working for the mysterious Millennium Group which investigates serial killers, conspiracies, the occult, and those obsessed with the end of the millennium.
Results.Stars: Lance Henriksen, Megan Gallagher, Terry O'Quinn, Brittany Tiplady

Results.Title: Tales from the Crypt
Results.Plot: Tales of horror based on the gruesome E.C. comic books of the 1950s presented by the legendary Crypt Keeper, a sinister ghoul obsessed with gallows humor and horrific puns.
Results.Stars: John Kassir, William Sadler, Roy Brocksmith, Miguel Ferrer

Results.Title: The Addams Family
Results.Plot: The misadventures of a blissfully macabre but extremely loving family.
Results.Stars: John Astin, Carolyn Jones, Jackie Coogan, Ted Cassidy

Results.Title: Santa Clarita Diet
Results.Plot: Sheila and Joel are married real estate agents who live and work in Santa Clarita, California. When Sheila dies, their lives take a dark turn.
Results.Stars: Drew Barrymore, Timothy Olyphant, Liv Hewson, Skyler Gisondo

Results.Title: iZombie
Results.Plot: A medical resident finds that being a zombie has its perks, which she uses to assist the police.
Results.Stars: Rose McIver, Malcolm Goodwin, Rahul Kohli, Robert Buckley

Results.Title: The Terror
Results.Plot: Supernatural, semihistorical, horror anthology series, where each season is inspired by a different infamous or mysterious real life historical tragedy.
Results.Stars: Jared Harris, Derek Mio, Tobias Menzies, Kiki Sukezane

Results.Title: The Vampire Diaries
Results.Plot: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.
Results.Stars: Nina Dobrev, Paul Wesley, Ian Somerhalder, Kat Graham

Results.Title: Being Human
Results.Plot: A werewolf, a vampire and a ghost try to live together and get along.
Results.Stars: Lenora Crichlow, Russell Tovey, Aidan Turner, Sinéad Keenan
